Is it Hard to Make Money on OnlyFans?

There is no direct answer to this question. There are models who successfully make so much money in a short period while others end up making little to no money.

Sexting With Your OnlyFans Subscribers – Become a Pro at Sexting

Estimated Reading Time: 2 min 32 sec

Is sexting still profitable, or better yet, worth the time? Well, a simple “YES” to this question would be an understatement. Going through Amber Sweetheart’s story of how she got labeled “Queen of Sexting,” should show you that sexting can make you a millionaire and get you loyal and returning subscribers sustaining business continuity. 

Sweetheart made over $2 million from sexting. According to her, she had to practice daily, sexting for around 16 hours. She earned about $200 – $1,000 for each sexting session lasting for 30 to 40 minutes. 

Sweetheart has written a book, The Sexting Bible: Amber Sweetheart Version. The book elaborates sexting best practices and how you can use the power of sexting to take your subscribers through a positively unforgettable erotic session.  

If you are an NSFW “not safe for work” OnlyFans female model content creator seeking to establish a deeper intimate connection with your subscribers, sexting should be on your priority list. Other than earning you more income, there are other significant reasons to sext. 

Make an appointment now

Why You Should Sext With Your OnlyFans Subscribers- 6 Reasons

1. Boosts your flirting and sexual confidence 

The best way to gauge your flirting and sexual confidence is through sexting. If you are shy, you will realize what makes you shy and if you are confident, you will also realize what makes you feel confident. With continued practice, you get to work on what makes you shy and to strengthen the aspects that give you an advantage when flirting. 

Sexting gives you insight into what your subscribers think about your body structure in varied attires and when you strip naked. Using the insights, you get to develop sexual positivity habits meant to help you cope with negative feedback and appreciate positive feedback. The more you accept yourself as you are, the better your flirting and sexual confidence becomes. 

2. Establishes a strong relationship between you and your subscribers 

Many of your subscribers that desire sexting with you do not do it for the sake of seeing you naked and just paying for your time, they crave intimacy. They want to get virtually intimate with you and imagine being in a relationship with you. 

For your subscribers, virtual intimacy with you makes them feel accepted. The way you interact with them, listen to them, show them love, and eventually calmly part with them makes them think like they are in an actual relationship. They feel nice getting a dopamine rush from your texts and eventually developing a lasting bond. 

According to Amber Sweetheart, she has about ten “boyfriends” whom she chats with everyday for about five to eight hours. She claims to know everything about the 10 clients she spends most of her time with, and to her it feels like they literally have an actual relationship. She deeply cares about her 10 frequent clients. Sweetheart’s revelation shows you that it is possible to earn a steady income if only you try sexting and get to create strong relationships with your subscribers. 

3. Helps your subscribers kill stress and boredom 

Many of your subscribers have daily routines they must follow and several tasks they cannot skip working on. After working all day, they desire to catch a break watching your content. But, watching your content might at times sound boring because they miss your presence. Sexting with your subscribers after or before they watch your content helps them kill stress and boredom faster because you are there and they can actively fantasize about you. 

Compared to watching your content alone, sexting keeps your subscribers actively engaged. Sexting can be likened to when you go live. During the sexting session, you and your subscribers can play interesting games such as truth or dare to make the moment more sensual. 

4. You and your subscribers get to explore different fantasies together

When sexting, the focus of pleasure is not on one party, the subscriber. It is crucial that your subscriber feels satisfied from the session, but you also should be a part of it. Through sexting, both of you share ideas and explore different sensual fantasies. 

Exploring varied fantasies with a subscriber equips you with experience that you can use in case you encounter another subscriber with the same fantasies. Having experience saves you time and gives you the chance to be more creative, boosting the chances of you getting a loyal subscriber. 

5. Your subscribers get to understand you and themselves better 

When sexing, you automatically become emotionally and physically vulnerable meaning your subscriber has the chance to scrutinize you and criticize you in unexpected ways. You also have the chance to do the same to them. At times, both of you might get emotionally hurt but eventually get a solution to that problem. This way, both of you become acquainted with each other’s vulnerabilities and know how to handle certain situations better. 

Sexting requires that you have boundaries put in place. Despite your subscribers paying to sext with you, it does not mean they own you. Having boundaries helps build mutual respect ultimately building a clear line of understanding between you and your subscribers.   

6. Sexting serves as an experimentation haven for some of your subscribers  

Most of the content you share on OnlyFans is usually pre-shot and uploaded, limiting your subscribers’ extent of experimentation. They only rely on the context of your uploaded videos or images to create varied mental sexual scenes and fantasies. 

Sexting is a game changer compared to pre-shot content as it lacks limits. When sexting, you and your subscriber can change the theme of discussion, decide to send nudes to each other, decide to go live together, experiment with toys, and do more because you are both present in the moment. 

Some of your subscribers would love to experiment specific fetishes with you, if possible, before they try them out with their loved ones. In the 123rd American Psychological Convention, held annually, a study presented showed that among every 10 people asked whether they have ever sexted, 8 admitted to have taken part in a sexting session. Those who sexted more found their love life to be more fun and interesting because of the sexual ideas they thought of exploring. Therefore, sexting allows you the chance to help your subscribers experiment while your business thrives and you also learn from them. 

Make an appointment now

Now That You Know Why You Should Sext, How Do You Do It Like a Pro?

Sexting is not all about sending nude photos, dirty talk, and getting it done quickly; It is a moment that demands attention from you and the subscriber, utter focus, and creativity. You and your subscriber start a sexual centered journey with varied aims. Both of you proceed through the whole journey texting each other, sending suggestive photos, sending nudes at times, and even video calling eventually attaining the set aims. 

There is no specific sexting formula that works for everyone. You are supposed to go with the flow of the session while referencing the steps outlined within this article. Consider the steps as a template to a successful sexting moment. But, generally, before you start sexting any subscriber, double-check the following:

  • Ensure you are sexting with the right subscriber 

Before sexting, you should at least have an idea of whom you are about to sext with. Your subscribers have varied preferences and personalities. Therefore, evaluate whether you have had any personal interactions with the subscriber you are about to sext to determine if you know their preferences. 

Sexting with a subscriber you know at a personal level, either you have sexted with them before or they have been sending personal messages requesting for custom content, is easier compared to sexting with a new subscriber.

If you have no prior knowledge of the subscriber you are about to sext with, you must have an open mindset and know that you might have to let them be in control so that you can learn to handle them better. Building a prior mindset of how the sexting session might seem like reduces the chances of you ruining it for your subscriber. 

At times, you might be in another sexting session and get another request to sext from a random subscriber, this moment calls for utter concentration. You must ensure you are sexting with the right subscriber to avoid making the sessions awkward because you are sending the wrong responses. 

  • Evaluate your mood 

You must be in the mood to sext before you start sexting, else you might end up pissing off your subscriber. If you are stressed, you should first relax and try to separate your day’s troubles from what is about to happen. Get into your sexy mood first, then proceed to sext. 

At times, you might have mixed feelings of being in the mood but doubting yourself. If this is the case, you should stop overthinking of the aftermath of it all or fearing that you might not be good. No one is perfect at sexting and sometimes, professional sexters also feel nervous.  

  • Check your autocorrect settings 

You do not want to send a text that you did not mean to. Therefore, ensure that autocorrect is off especially if you are going to sext in a language other than English. If you are comfortable with autocorrect being on, you can let it be, but create a mindset that would remind you to double-check every text you plan to send before hitting the send button.  

  • Ensure you are about to sext using a secure device 

By default, you should be running your OnlyFans business on a secure device, free of malware, viruses, and trojans. Despite this being a default requirement, you should counter check to ensure your device is secure before you begin sexting. Launch your antivirus software to scan for viruses and ensure your firewalls are up and running. This is a very critical step especially if you are an anonymous OnlyFans content creator. 

If you are an anonymous OnlyFans creator, before sexting do the following also: 

  • Cover your face 

At some point while sexting, you might have to send pictures including feet pics or pics of your boobs. To avoid revealing your true identity, wear a mask prior to the session. At times, you might get carried away while sexting and get yourself video chatting without second thinking, hence, revealing your face. That is why you must take precaution and wear your cosplay costume or mask before you start sexting. 

  • Come up with code names 

Before the sexting session begins, think of various code names you and your subscriber can use. Code names will mask your identity. If your subscriber is okay with using their real names then that is okay. But, as for you, ensure you insist on using a particular code name. 

  • Come up with code names for various activities 

Code names for the activities you might participate in serve as an extra layer of protection to reduce the chances of your identity being revealed in case someone known to you accidentally comes across the sexting chats. For example, your friends or workmates might accidentally stumble into your sexting conversations, but since you used code names for varied activities, they would not easily understand what the whole conversation means. 

  • Change your background 

You should change your background to reduce the chances of your subscriber identifying you from the outlook of your background. You might never know, maybe the sexting request you have received is from someone who knows your house so well or the place you are sexting from. The only way they can know you is by you revealing your background. Therefore, if you are not ready to change your background, ensure it is hidden from view when taking photos or video chatting. 

  • Turn off device back ups 

If you are planning to take selfies or any other pictures and send them to your subscriber while sexting, ensure there is no application backing up those photos because you must delete the photos after the session is done. If there is an application backing up any of the photos, anyone with access to your device might end up finding them, hence compromising your identity. 

Make an appointment now

The Ultimate Sexting Template 

After double checking the outlined precautions, now you can proceed to plan for a sexting session. If you do not have prior knowledge on how to successfully sext with a subscriber, here is a template with steps you can follow to successfully start and end a sexting session that will leave you and your subscriber satisfied. 

  • Ensure there is consent between you and the subscriber 

As the owner of an OnlyFans business, you must have a service that defines when a subscriber can request for a sexting session and how much it costs. Despite having a clearly defined offer, you have the right to say no to a sexting session when you are not in the mood. 

Your subscribers also have the right to turn down your pay-per-view messages trying to convince them to sext with you. You must respect the fact that your subscribers also have a life of their own. Mutual respect between you and your subscribers ensures that the both of you work harmoniously in case you decide to sext. 

To convince your target subscriber to sext, you can send them a sex story depicting what might happen if the both of you decide to sext within a specified period. Stories can easily sway even the most rebellious subscribers. 

You can also send your target subscriber a teasing photo coupled with a text that catches the subscriber off guard. Though, do not send nudes to your subscriber as a way of triggering a positive response from them.  

If you are approaching a subscriber whom you had sexted with before, send them a short message informing them that you miss them. You can couple your message with a bundle of free videos or images they can view later when they are free and desire to have another sexting session with you. The images or videos should be inline with what your subscriber loves. 

Summarily, the aim of getting consent first is to ensure that both of you are into what is to come and are ready to set aside time for it. Also, keep in mind that your subscriber might change their mind; therefore, you must keep tabs on your subscriber to ascertain whether they are okay with the sexting plan once the agreed time approaches. 

  • Layout the boundaries and what is to happen to the sexts once the session is over 

After both you and the subscriber consent to sext at a precise period, take time to set boundaries. Having boundaries builds respect between the two of you. It also reduces the chances of you or the subscriber getting turned off during the sessions. 

The two of you should discuss the type of content you expect to see. Since the exchange involves two parties, your subscriber will also be sharing pieces of their own content. It is crucial that you two inform each other of the content you are comfortable receiving. For example, a subscriber might end up sending you a dick pic while sexting and yet you do not love receiving such pictures from your subscribers. To avoid such events that might disgust you, ensure you set content-centered boundaries. 

Both of you should also agree on the type of language that is allowed during the sexting session. There are subscribers that love talking dirty while others try to avoid it. 

You two should also decide whether you will be sending each other texts only or incorporating videos and photos. This agreement is important especially when you are a faceless OnlyFans creator. 

Finally, the two of you should decide on how the texts sent will be utilized after the session. If you do decide to delete them, define how both of you can prove to each other that the sent content has been deleted.  

  • Come up with ideas regarding what the two of you would love to do 

At this point, you know your subscriber’s dos and don’ts and they also know yours. It is now time to come up with ideas on what the both of you want out of the sexting session. If you have prior experience sexting with the subscriber, you can help them come up with ideas. On the other hand, if you have no idea of what the subscriber likes and detests, allow them to be in control; listen to what the subscriber has to say. 

Be vulnerable and have clear intentions. Do not hold your ideas back when brainstorming with your subscriber. Also, allow your subscriber time to contribute to what exactly the two of you should get into. 

Both of you should reference various fantasies and fetishes that you would love to fulfill. Talk of your fetishes to calm your subscriber down and get them to open up to you. Being able to fulfill your subscriber’s fetishes and fantasies may turn the subscriber into a loyal one because they feel more understood by you. 

Before you proceed to the next step, the two of you must decide on the point to end everything. Sexting can last as long as you want but to make things easier for the two of you, you must know when to end it. Remember, your subscriber is paying for your time despite the key aim being pleasure.   

  • Set the ball rolling slowly 

Start the sexting session with subtle questions meant to warm the two of you up for the moment. Warming up to the moment helps the two of you forget about the daily activities you had to undertake. You both relax allowing your minds to start focusing on the intimate moment brewing. 

To start the session, you can send your subscriber a cocky message or pics of your sex toys. This tactic jump starts their system making them anticipate what is to happen. 

If the subscriber finds it hard to start sexting, help them break out of that shell of fear by asking them questions covering their day’s activities. For example, you can ask them to describe how their day was. Once they start opening up, keep asking questions about what they desire and would love to get out of a virtual texting session. Eventually, you can start asking them intimate questions. 

  • Creatively keep the session entertaining and fun 

Based on what the two of you had planned, you should keep the session going while incorporating humor and various aspects of entertainment. Make jokes meant to arouse your subscriber while at the same time making them laugh. 

Take part in various activities that make the moment fun and entertaining. For example, the two of you can send each other texts describing how you would treat each other to a great love making session if you were physically together. 

  • You can start sending semi-nude pictures 

If it is okay with your subscriber, you can start sending semi-nude pictures such as you in a thong or a bralette. Such pictures are supposed to prepare your subscriber for what is to come.

You can also send short video clips in which you dress up in various enticing clothes. Your subscriber will find this interesting and start selecting for you some clothes to try on. This move keeps the conversation going rather than having to text all the way. 

  • You can delay your responses for a while 

To create curiosity, you can delay your responses. The subscriber will patiently wait for the surprise. Though, when you decide to delay a response, let your subscriber know that you are still there and are preparing something interesting for them. This way, you get to keep and pique their attention at the same time. 

You can also delay some responses to pleasure yourself. It is not always about the subscriber. You are also a human being with feelings. Therefore, if the moment gets to you, enjoy yourself too. 

  • If it is part of what the two of you thought of, you can start sending nudes 

Sharing nudes serves as the climax in most sexing sessions. Though, it is not a must that you end a sexting session with nudes. If you do send your subscriber nudes, ensure they are real time nudes. Avoid sending your subscriber past nudes because they might feel like you are swindling them. 

  • Ensure you chat with the subscriber afterwards 

Many models miss this part of sexting because they consider it insignificant. Chatting with your subscriber after the sexting session helps you collect feedback. Ask your subscriber how they felt and if they might love to have another session planned for another day. 

Based on the response you receive from your subscriber after the session is done, you can gauge your sexting skills and know where you are supposed to improve. 

Conclusion

Sexting with your OnlyFans subscribers increases the chances of you making recurring income due to the relationships you create with your subscribers. As seen from Sweetheart’s success story, sexting has a place of its own in the NSFW content market and you can rake in millions if and only if you keep practicing. Use this article guide to educate yourself about the ins and outs of sexting. Share the article among your network of creators too.
